I had some trouble resolving the latest version of JUnit from the 
central =
repository.  Brief investigation revealed that it is due to the 
metadata n=
ot being properly updated to include the new versions [1], 
although 4.3 an=
d 4.3.1 are hosted there.  This causes problems when 
using maven ranges, a=
s 4.2 is determined to be the newest.  Does the 
JUnit community handle dep=
loyment, or should I look elsewhere?

Thanks,
Stephen Pack
